faq_1.title: Why should I join CoolClub?
faq_1.content: CoolClub is a membership program for all Coolmate customers, offering many benefits. Members can accumulate spending to rank up, enjoy exclusive gifts and promotions, earn CoolCash on every order, redeem rewards, and much more.

faq_2.title: Is there a fee to join CoolClub? How to register?
faq_2.content: You can register for CoolClub completely free by creating an account on Coolmate.me. Once registered, you’ll receive all benefits of the New Member tier and an instant 15% shopping voucher (up to 50,000 VND).

faq_3.title: When did the old CoolClub end? What’s new?
faq_3.content: The old CoolClub program ended on 25/09/2023 for an upgrade. In the new version, you’ll enjoy better experiences with more tiered privileges, CoolCash rebates, reward redemption, and many exclusive offers.

faq_4.title: Does CoolCash expire? If yes, when?
faq_4.content: CoolCash accumulates after each valid order during 4 quarters and gets its expiry date on the 1st day of each quarter: 01/01, 01/04, 01/07, and 01/10.

faq_5.title: Can I combine membership and other promotions?
faq_5.content: Yes. CoolClub benefits will be applied automatically on top of other available promotions. However, some benefits may vary depending on the campaign policy.

faq_6.title: When does my membership level get updated?
faq_6.content: Membership levels update as soon as you reach the required spending. Levels are reviewed quarterly on 01/01, 01/04, 01/07, and 01/10.

faq_7.title: How do I earn CoolCash?
faq_7.content: After registering for CoolClub, you'll earn CoolCash from every order depending on your membership level. 1 CoolCash = 1 VND in payment value.

faq_8.title: Can I use CoolCash as a discount?
faq_8.content:
Yes. You can deduct CoolCash directly from your order value:
- If you have less than 50% of order value in CoolCash: all will be used.
- If you have more than 50%: only up to 50% will be used and the rest saved for next time.

faq_9.title: Do returns affect CoolCash and membership level?
faq_9.content: Yes. CoolCash and level are based on successful order values. Returns may reduce the final value.

faq_10.title: Do orders from e-commerce platforms count toward CoolClub?
faq_10.content: Currently, CoolClub is only for purchases made on the Coolmate website. Orders from third-party platforms are not counted.
